rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}
Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {TRN4030, TRN4040, TRN4050}

description: Students will undertake in-country study at the institution with which Monash University has an exchange agreement. This study will be the equivalent of 12 points of fifth-year postgraduate study in Arts at Monash University in the form of 5th year unit(s) offered by the host institution in the domain of translation studies.
